gunk generate -v ./...
grep '\/\/ with a space' all.pb.go
grep '\/\/ without a space' all.pb.go

-- go.mod --
module testdata.tld/util

-- .gunkconfig --
[generate go]
plugin_version=e471641

-- echo.gunk --
package test

type Person struct {
	// Comment
	// with a space
	Name string `pb:"1"`

	//Comment
	//without a space
	Surname string `pb:"2"`
}
